Fact.Name: Qualified mortgage interest
Fact.Description: Qualified mortgage interest including points (if you're the buyer)

Fact.Name: Investment interest
Fact.Description: Investment interest (limited to your net investment income)

Fact.Name: State and Local Taxes
Fact.Description: Capped at $10,000. There are four types of deductible nonbusiness taxes: 1) State, local, and foreign income taxes; 2) State and local general sales taxes; 3) State and local real estate taxes; 4) State and local personal property taxes

Fact.Name: Estimated medical and dental expenses
Fact.Description: Total expenses that exceed 7.5% of your adjusted gross income. Can include the total estimated amount paid for health insurance premiums, not including any amount the employer pays

Fact.Name: Casualty Losses
Fact.Description: Casualty and theft losses relating to your home, household items, and vehicles if the loss took place in a federally declared disaster area
